TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(object sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的按钮时引发事件控件被单击。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 控件还将引发单击某些按钮时的其他专用的事件 (与按钮`CommandName`属性设为"删除"、"更新"和"页上"，示例)。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example). 在使用这些按钮之一时，应考虑处理由控件提供的专用事件之一 (如或)。When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加委托给事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/CS/gridviewcommandeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/VB/gridviewcommandeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加委托给事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommandvb.aspx#1)]
